product_name: Sierra Designs Backcountry Bed 2.5-Season Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: Instead of zippers, this ingenious sleeping bag uses an oversized comforter that rests across your body much like the comforter on your bed, allowing you to sleep comfortably in any position.
short_description: Instead of zippers, this ingenious sleeping bag uses an oversized comforter that rests across your body much like the comforter on your bed, allowing you to sleep comfortably in any position.
